title: Recent severe drop in FPS after mandatory windows update
body: Hi, so i normally play with around 120 fps just about every single game and now suddenly after having to do a windows update my fps has dropped dramatically down to 35-40. Its so large of a difference that it feels as though my game is actually lagging. Is there anything that i could check to see if i can fix this problem?

replies.body: That is a pretty big and sudden change in frames!  There could be some driver issues causing this after your OS update, so definitely make sure they're up to date.  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help make sure your pc and settings are in good shape, then test it in a custom game.
